title: UnicornDAO: Nadya Tolokno's "Pussyverse" and the Fight for Equality
description: Nadya Tolokonnikova of Pussy Riot fame is building the future of feminist equality, beginning with UnicornDAO, a community-led investment fund that invests in minority and marginalized artists. Nadya speaks to Kevin about her political origins in Russia and the current collaborators in her Web3 vision.
dc:creator: Kevin Rose
